font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 adj. 傲慢的： having a feeling of superiority that shows itself in an overbearing attitude
【例】 a bumptious young man whose family wealth gave him a sense of entitlement 权利；津贴
【例】be bumptious over one's inferiors 对下级态度傲慢
【近】 assumptive, haughty, imperious, overweeing, peremptory, pompous, presuming, presumptuous, self-assertive, supercilious
【反】 humble, modest, unarrogant, unpretentious 谦虚的，低调的
【记】 bump 四处撞人的，非常傲慢
